headline: Northrop Grumman’s (NOC) Stock Needs More Than Share Buybacks To Shine
summary: Northrop Grumman announced a $3 billion share repurchase program just two weeks ago. Its stock price has been going down since then. The market is giving clear indications that if the company wants to attract investors and reward existing shareholders, it will have to do a little more than that. Northrop Grumman Corp is a […]

headline: RTX Clinches a $43M Deal to Support ESSM and NSMS Programs
summary: RTX gets a contract from the Naval Sea Systems Command, WA, D.C., to provide technical support to the ESSM and NSMS Programs.

raw.headline: RTX Clinches a $43M Deal to Support ESSM and NSMS Programs

headline: Lockheed Martin Secures a $11.8 Billion Contract to Produce F-35 Jets
summary: LMT's unit secures a $11.76 billion modification contract for the production and delivery of 145 F-35 jets.

raw.headline: Lockheed Martin Secures a $11.8 Billion Contract to Produce F-35 Jets
